New in and children's reading ideas

Reviews, suggestions and lists of new books for children aged 0-11. We have recommendations for readers aged 11+ in our Young Adult section.

Recommended new audiobooks for children #3

Written by Sophie Green · Published Jan 22, 2018

We've picked out the best new CD and digital audiobooks for children.

Revisit the Bear of Very Little Brain and meet some new bears this Winnie the Pooh Day

Written by Sophie Green · Published Jan 18, 2018

18 January is Winnie the Pooh Day. We've made a list of our most popular Winnie the Pooh titles and favourite books about bears to mark the occasion.

New children's books for January 2018

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 29, 2017

Snails, dogs, hippos, cats, rabbits, mice, giraffes, bears and birds of all kinds feature in this month's new titles.

It's the final day of our children's advent calendar!

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 24, 2017

As it's the last day, we've got TWO books. Click through to see what they are!

Father Christmas and Me, by Matt Haig & Chris Mould

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 23, 2017

Today's book is Father Christmas and Me, by Matt Haig & Chris Mould.

Hetty Feather's Christmas, by Jacqueline Wilson & Nick Sharratt

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 22, 2017

Today's book is Hetty Feather's Christmas, by Jacqueline Wilson & Nick Sharratt.

Bah! Humbug!, by Michael Rosen & Tony Ross

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 21, 2017

Today's book is Bah! Humbug!, by Michael Rosen & Tony Ross.

Top Elf, by Caleb Zane Huett

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 20, 2017

Today's book is Top Elf, by Caleb Zane Huett.

The Accidental Father Christmas, by Tom McLaughlin

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 19, 2017

Today's book is The Accidental Father Christmas, by Tom McLaughlin.

There's a Dragon in my Stocking!, by Tom Nicoll & Sarah Horne

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 18, 2017

Today's book is There's a Dragon in my Stocking!, by Tom Nicoll & Sarah Horne.
